data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India. Please, stir the 2,808 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Banjara (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, make bold the prophets in Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Bijapur, Chhattisgarh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Bijapur a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;
